snippet: A company that markets stem cell therapy cooperated with the filmmaker on this one-sided documentary focusing on treatment success stories.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Eric Merola documentary film The God Cells.
lead_paragraph: A company that markets stem cell therapy cooperated with the filmmaker on this one-sided documentary focusing on treatment success stories.

headline.main: Review: ‘The God Cells’ Advocates Fetal Tissue Therapy Without Debate
